messages.subject: writing and taking things personally
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/15/02 8:49:38 AM, melinda2u@yahoo.com writes:  And
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/15/02 8:49:38 AM, melinda2u@... writes:

<<
I think that writing ought to be reserved for those
who have something to say. >>

And this is the place!!!!

We're talking about real things for real purposes, and we're doing it in
writing.

I didn't have my feelings hurt in the tirade against grammar teachers. <g>

I was just pushing back against an argument with the counter argument. It
was purely business/logic, and not personal. I'm fine, and it does help for
people who have big teacher-resentment to hear the other side.

I have to drive to another town and haven't finished my e-mail. OH HORRORS!
Kirby and Holly are in the car and if I don't log off RIGHT NOW he'll be late
for work. And I won't be back til 4:00... Oh the withdrawals...

Sandra
